evidence.text: the language below from your application requires clarification: . . . . The other narrative includes the following terms: DEI. The strengthening communities narrative includes the following terms: Diversity, Equity; DEI.

reply all to this letter by email by February 19, 2025 and copy and paste this statement: 'I certify that RSVP of Erie County . . . complies with all administration Executive Orders and does not include any activities that promote DEI activities.'

extracted.value: Americorps demanded Erie County certify no DEI activities under Executive Orders 14151/14173, threatening grant termination.
